meta.title: Hello, Blogs
meta.summary: This is the beginning of a static-first journal on systems, product engineering, and calm clarity.

html:
This is the beginning of a static-first journal on systems, product engineering, and calm clarity.

What this is

Posts live as Markdown, compile to HTML at build time, and deploy as fully static pages. No runtime parsing, no revalidation, no regeneration.

What to expect

  • Technical deep dives (distributed systems, performance, tooling)
  • Short field notes (design decisions, tradeoffs)
  • A reading-first layout that stays out of your way
